sink.preCopyScript:
IF OBJECT_ID(N'dbo.DeviceOverview_New', N'U') IS NULL
BEGIN
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DeviceOverview_New](
	[article] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[serial] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[type] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[status] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[softwareVersion] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[latestConnectionDate] [datetime2](7) NULL,
	[hwCoverageEnd] [date] NULL,
	[hwCoverageExpired] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[soldToAccountId] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[soldToAccountName] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[partnerAccountId] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[partnerAccountName] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[customerAccount] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[address] [nvarchar](500) NULL,
	[zip] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[city] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[state] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[country] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[contactName] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[contactEmail] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[contactPhone] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[deviceFriendlyName] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[warrantyEnd] [date] NULL,
	[warrantyExpired] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[serviceContract] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[serviceContractEnd] [date] NULL,
	[registrationDate] [date] NULL,
	[accountId] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[deviceId] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[productLine] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[productTeam] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[cloudServiceLevel] [nvarchar](200) NULL,
	[shippingDate] [date] NULL
) ON [PRIMARY] 
END
ELSE
BEGIN
TRUNCATE TABLE  [dbo].[DeviceOverview_New]
END
